ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Chain of stations in the Augsburg College Search Coil Array.
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: The Augsburg College Search Coil Logical Observatory Chain
ResourceHeader.Description: The Logical Observatory created to represent the chain of stations based in Antartica that have Augsburg College search coil magnetometers. The chain of stations includes: British Antarctic Survey A80, British Antarctic Survey A81, British Antarctic Survey A84, Halley Bay, and South Pole.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge Mark J. Engebretson, Department of Physics, Augsburg College, 2211 Riverside Avenue, Minneapolis, MN 55454-1338, USA for providing access to Augsburg Array data resources.
